meanings.definition: A person who has withdrawn from a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The school club had a few dropouts who decided not to participate anymore.
meanings.sent2: The company experienced a decrease in productivity due to several dropouts from the team.
meanings.sent3: The party was missing some dropouts who left early, but the fun continued.
meanings.sent4: In the game of musical chairs, the dropouts were left without a seat.
meanings.sent5: The garden had some dropouts among the flowers, creating a unique pattern.

meanings.definition: The act of dropping out or withdrawing from something.
meanings.sent1: The dropouts from the marathon were disappointed they couldn't finish the race.
meanings.sent2: The dropouts from the class missed out on valuable learning opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The dropouts from the dance group decided to start their own club.
meanings.sent4: The dropouts from the project left a gap that needed to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The dropouts from the choir left a noticeable silence in the performance.
